S.FORM: kɯɕɯŋgɯ aʑo ŋgumdʑɯɣ pɯ-ŋu-a tɕe,
tɕendɤre canjia gongzuo stu kɯ-mɤku ʑo tɕe tɕe
nɤki pɯ-ɕti tɕe,
tɯ-lɯz pɯ-xtɕi, tɯ-kɤ-tso pɯ-me, tɕe tɕe
nɤkinɯ tɯ-xtshi tɕe,
nɤki tatshi zɯ pɯnɯkoŋtsoa tɕe,
tɕe nɯnɯtɕu gongzuo ɯma tunɤmea pɯŋu tɕe
nɯtɕu chumuye ɣɯ ŋgumdʑɯɣ pɯŋua
tɕe kutɕu kaihui ɲɯra tɕe,
kɯre (=mbarkhom) pɯɣia ɲɯra tɕe,
tɕeri lɤɣea tɕe kɤŋke lɤɣea ma akɯ thɯɬoʁa ma
(nɤki) akɯ thɯɬoʁa pɯra ma
andi chɯɬoʁa tɕe rcanɯ,
ʑaʑa mɤ-zɣɯt-a ɲɯɕti tɕe, tɕe aʑosti akɯ thɯɬoʁa pɯra
tɕe akɯ thɯɬoʁa pɯra ri,
alo tɕe, tɕɤlo rɯŋgu tɕe,
zgoku ku-tɯ-pɣaʁ ri tɕe,
khɯjŋga kɯtu ci sɤtɕha kɤntɤm ci tu tɕe,
kɯɕɯŋgɯ pjɯfɕɤtnɯ tɕe,
nɯtɕu tɕaχpa pjɤtu tutinɯ tɕe,
tɕaχpa tɕe, qiangdao ɲɯŋu thamtham
tɕe nɯnɯ ŋu tɕe, ɯnɯnɯ tɕu ɣɤʑu tutinɯ pɯŋu tɕe,
tɯrme pjɯsatnɯ, tɯlaχtɕha ɲɯkɯnɯsɯkho
tɕheme tɕe tukɯnɤkhe kɯfse ɲɯŋu tutinɯ pjɤŋu tɕe,
tɕendɤre ɲɯzdara pɯŋu
(=ɲɯmua, zdɤr)
tɕe ɲɯmua tɕe tɕendɤre,
nɯtɕu pa zɯ ɯχtɯ ci zɯ khɯjŋga kɯtu ci ɣɤʑu tɕe
ɯnɯnɯtɕu ɕpɯrma tɕeri, tɤjpa ɣɤʑu ɲɯti,
tɤjpa ɣɤʑu tɕe tɕe, aŋga mphrɯɣtɕhɯla ci pɯtu tɕe
ɯnɯnɯ ɯphaʁ ntsi nɯ ɯqiɯ nɯ lɤ-nɤβɟu-t-a, ɯqiɯ nɯ lɤ-ŋga-t-a tɕe, nɯ kɯfse pɯrŋgɯa.
tɕe ɯfso tɕe, tɯfsoʁ lasɤʑa tɕe, aphaʁ ntsi tosɤci tuti ɲɯŋu.
tɕe mɤʑɯ ɕɤr tɕe, ɕɤχcɤl tɕe, tɕɤkɯ phɤri zɯ khɯna "aoŋ aoŋ"
"qhi" ɯkɯti kɯfse ɣɤʑu tɕe rcanɯ, a-tɯ-mu pɯ-saχaʁ ʑo ɲɯti
tɕeri akɤpa maŋe tɕe, mɯ-lɤ-fsoʁ mɤɕtʂa pɯrŋgɯ-a pɯra tuti ɲɯŋu.
tɕe pɯ-rŋgɯ-a pɯra tɕe, tɕe ɯfso tɕe tɤ-rɤru-a tɕe,
atʂha kɯ-me thɯ-ɣe-a tɕeri
sengongju kɯki si ɯkɯphɯt kupa gongren pɯtunɯ tɕe,
nɯra nɯɕki jaria, wuma ʑo tɯrme ɲɯ-sna-nɯ tɕe
kɤndzɤtshi nɯ́wɣ-mbi-a-nɯ, a-tɯci ra pa-rku-nɯ ri
tɕhemɤpɯ pɯ-ɕti-a qhe tɤtɕɯ ra nɯ-ɕki ku-rɤʑi-a mɯ́j-naz-a qhe
kɤ-ʑɣɤɕɯfka mɯ-pɯ-naz-a
tɕe nɯ kɯfse thɯɣea qhe, tɯmɢla tɯmɢla thɯɣea tɕe
qiche kɯnɤ sŋɯqiɯ, tɯsŋi kɯfse tu-ŋke kɯre, aʑo kɯnɤ tɯsŋi tɕe kutɕu ʁnɯ-sŋi tɕe thɯ-ʑɣɤsɤzɣɯt-a tu-ti ɲɯŋu.
tɕe kutɕu thɯ-ʑɣɤsɤzɣɯt-a tɕe tɕeri,
xiaolitang zɯ kaihui ɲɯ-ɤsɯ-βzu-nɯ tɕe,
naria ri, ji-ŋgumdʑɯɣ nɯ kɯ tɤ́-wɣ-nɤmqe-a
"nɤ-χti ɯ-rca andi nɯtɕu mɤ-tɯ-ɣi kɯma, akɯ zɯ nɤʑo sthɯci tɯɬoʁ,
ma wenti a-nɯ-ɬoʁ tɕe, tɕhi tɯ-pe ɲɯti tɕe, tɤ́-wɣ-nɤmqe-a
ɯʑori ɲɤ-tɯ-maqhu
nɯra ɲɯti tɕe tɤ-́wɣ-nɤmqe-a tu-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.

TEXT.S: tɕe nɤki, ɯ-me nɯ pɯ-rɤβzjoz ri tham ɯ-gongzuo ɯ-ma me,
tɕe paχɕa chɯ-ntsɣe tɕe, nɯ kɯfse ɕti tɕe
ɯnɯnɯ pjɯ-fɕɤt ɲɯ-ŋu
tɕe ɯ-χti nɯ kɯ cha ntsɯ ku-tshi pɯ-ŋu
tɕe cha nɤ cha ku-tshi pjɯ-ɕti tɕe
tɕe aʑo mɤ-mda tuixiu nɯ-βzu-t-a tɤ-nɯna-a pɯ-ra ma
nɤki ji-wa kɯ kutɕu ji-me ku-ndɤm pɯ-ŋu, ɯʑo kutɕu shangban tu-βze
tɕe ɯ-me nɯnɯ xianzhong nɯtɕu pjɯ-rɤβzjoz pɯ-ŋu ri,
ɯ-wa nɯ kɯ cha ntsɯ chɯ-tshi qhe,
ɯ-me mɯ́j-nɯβdaʁ qhe tɕendɤre ɯ-me nɯ
(nɤkinɯ) ci ci pjɯ-nɯ-mtsɯr, ci ci pjɯ-nɯ-fka
ci ci qhe nɤki shangban ju-ɕe tɕe,
kɯm mɯ-chɯ-pe qhe sɤcɯ kɯm kɯ-ɲɟɯ ɲɯ-βde qhe
laχtɕha ra tu-zmɯrki,
nɯra ntsɯ ɲɯ-ɕti qhe, tɕe mɯ́j-pe qhe,
tɕe aʑo mɤ-kɯ-mda tuixiu nɯ-βzu-t-a tɕe tɤ-nɯna-a tɕe,
kutɕu pɯ-ɣi-a pɯ-ra tu-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe kutɕu pɯ-ɣi-a pɯ-ra tɕe tɕeri
a-me pɯ-rɤβzjoz ri,
nɤkinɯ kaoshi ta-βzu ri mɯ-pjɤ-cha,
tɕendɤre kɯmaʁ ji-kɤ-nɯfse tɕe, ji-bangmang ɯ-kɯ-βzu tɕe,
guanxi ɯ-kɯ-βzu kɯ-fse
"wortɕhi" kɯ-ti kɯ-cha ri maŋe
tɕe nɯnɯra, nɯ fse pɯ-rɤʑi-j pɯ-ra
tɕe a-me kɯ mɤʑɯ kɤ-rɤβzjoz tɯxpa jamar pjɯ-mnat-a ɲɯ-ti ri
ji-wa kɯ nɯ mɯ́j-nɤle
tɕe pjɯ-tɯ-mnɤt mɤ-jɤɣ ɲɯ-ti tɕe,
tɕe kɤ-mnɤt mɯ-pɯ-ŋgrɯ,
tɕendɤre kaoshi mɯ-pɯ-cha tu-ti ɲɯŋu.
tɕe nɯ ɯ-qhu songpan nɯtɕu (nɤkinɯ)
lüyouju nɯtɕu tɯrme ɲɯ-ɤsɯ-ɕar tɕe,
ji-kɤ-nɯfse ci kɯ nɯtɕu a-kɤ-ɕe tɕe pe tɕe,
χsɯ-xpa tɕe zhuanzhen 转真 tu-βze khɯ tɕe
nɯtɕu pe ɲɯti ri, tɕe kari pɯŋu ri ma
nɤki jiwa kɯ ku-ɕe mɤ-jɤɣ ma mbroχpa sɤtɕha ɕti tɕe,
mbroχpa ra ŋɤn-nɯ tɕe,
nɯ tɕu a-mɤ-nɯ-raʁ ma tɕi-me tɯrdoʁ ma maŋe tɕe, tɕi-rkɯ kɯ-rɤʑi me ɲɯti tɕe
tɕe mɯ́j-nɤle ri, ɯʑo kɯ nɯtɕu ɕe-a ra ɲɯti tɕe kari (ɯme kɯ)
tɕe nɯ tɕu kari tɕe, ʁnɯxpa cho ɯ-qiɯ ɕ-kɤ-tsu tɕe,
mɤʑɯ ɯqiɯ, tɯxpa ɣɯ ɯqiɯ nɯ a-kɤ-rɤʑi tɕe,
χsɯ-xpa nɯnɯ tu-tsu pɯŋu tɕe, zhuanzhen pɯkhɯ nɤ pjɯkhɯ pɯŋu ri
tɕeri li nɯnɯ tɕu zɯ tɤtɕɯ ci ɯkɯ-nɤpe ci mbroχpa ci pjɤ-tu tɕe,
nɯnɯ tɯrme wuma ʑo pɯ-pe ri, ji-wa kɯ mbroχpa ɲɯ-ɕar mɤ-jɤɣ ɲɯ-ti tɕe, tɕe dianhua ʑ-lo-lɤt tɕe, a-me kutɕu thɯ-nɯɣe pɯra" to-ti ɲɯŋu
tɕe nɯ ɯqhu tɕe kɯki nɤkinɯ
kupa ci na-ɕar tɕe, nɤki, tɕeri nɯnɯ kupa nɯnɯ mɯ-pɯ-nɤpe-t-a ri,
ji-wa cho yigedanwei ɲɯ-ŋu-ndʑi tɕe,
ji-wa kɯ ɲɯ-nɤpe tɕe ji-wa cha ɲɯrga tɕe,
tɤtɕɯ nɯ kɯ cha ju-ɣɯt qhe, ji-wa cho cha ku-tshi-ndʑi
shafa ɯtaʁ zɯ tu-nɯjmɤzdɤβndʑi tɕe ku-rŋgɯ-ndʑi qhe tɕe
ɯgrɤl ʑo ɲɯ-ʑɣɤɣɤmendʑi ɲɯ-ɕti qhe
ʑɯrɯʑɤri qhe jiwa naɕɯrga qhe
tɕe "ɣa" tatɯt qhe, tɕe nɯ cho ci tɤpandʑi pɯra tu-ti ɲɯŋu
tɕendɤre tham tɕe ɯma me ɲɯti
tɕe ɯma me ri, ɯχti nɯ gongshangju 工商局 ɣɯ ŋgumdʑɯɣ ci ŋu,
tɕe nɯnɯ tɕe, ɯme nɯ kɯ andi paχɕa ɲɯ-ntsɣe ŋu.
paχɕa ɲɯ-ntsɣe tɕe ɯ-shouru ɲɯpe,
nɯ-kɤ-mɟa ɲɯpe
tham tɕe kha ra ta-nɯ-χtɯ-nɯ tɕe pe wo,
tɕe ɯme ɣɯ ɯtɕɯ ci tu, ɯme ci tu,
tɕe nɯ ɯme ɣɯ ɯme nɯnɯ jɤxtshi
xiaoxue biye taβzu
tɕe mazhong kaoshi taβzu tɕe,
kɯki mbarkhom sɤtɕha tɕe, mazhong nɯ kɯmna kɤpa ŋu tɕe
nɯnɯtɕu pjɤcha tuti ɲɯŋu
tɕe yingyu wuma ʑo cha tu-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe ɯ-pɕi sɤtɕha ju-ɕe ɲɯ-sɯsɤm rcama yingyu wuma ʑo cha tu-ti ɲɯ-ŋu
tɕe nɯ ɲɯŋu, tɕe nɯ ɣɯ ɯʁi ci tu tɕe, nɯnɯ tɤtɕɯpɯ ŋu tɕe,
pɤjkhu youeryuqn ri ɕti,
tɕe nɯra tufɕat pjɯβze ɲɯŋu
tɕe ɯʑo kɯ pjɯfɕɤt nɯtshɯci aʑɯɣ mɯ-ɲɤ-ʁzɤβ wo
aj ʑo pjɯfɕata tɕe, ʑɯmkhɤm ʑo ɲɤtɕɯtɕɯt ɕti
